# GET /v1/subscriptionPromotionalOffers/{id}/relationships/prices | Apple Developer Documentation

- [ App Store Connect API ](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi)

- [ GET /v1/subscriptionPromotionalOffers/{id}/relationships/prices ](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-subscriptionPromotionalOffers-_id_-relationships-prices)

-  GET /v1/subscriptionPromotionalOffers/{id}/relationships/prices 

Web Service Endpoint# GET /v1/subscriptionPromotionalOffers/{id}/relationships/prices

App Store Connect API 3.6+## [URL](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-subscriptionPromotionalOffers-_id_-relationships-prices#url)



```
GET https://api.appstoreconnect.apple.com/v1/subscriptionPromotionalOffers/{id}/relationships/prices
```

## [Path Parameters](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-subscriptionPromotionalOffers-_id_-relationships-prices#path-parameters)

`id``string` (Required) 

## [Query Parameters](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-subscriptionPromotionalOffers-_id_-relationships-prices#query-parameters)

`limit``integer`

 Maximum: `200`## [Response Codes](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-subscriptionPromotionalOffers-_id_-relationships-prices#response-codes)

` 200 OK``[SubscriptionPromotionalOfferPricesLinkagesResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/subscriptionpromotionalofferpriceslinkagesresponse)`OK`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 400 Bad Request``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Bad Request`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 401 Unauthorized``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Unauthorized`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 403 Forbidden``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Forbidden`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 404 Not Found``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Not Found`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 429 ``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)``

 Content-Type: application/json ## [See Also](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-subscriptionPromotionalOffers-_id_-relationships-prices#see-also)

### [Endpoints](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-subscriptionPromotionalOffers-_id_-relationships-prices#Endpoints)

[`Create a Promotional Offer`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/post-v1-subscriptionpromotionaloffers)Create a promotional offer for an auto-renewable subscription.[`List All Promotional Offer Prices for a Subscription`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-subscriptionpromotionaloffers-_id_-prices)Get a list of prices of a promotional offer for an auto-renewable subscription, for a specified territory.[`Read Promotional Offer Information`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-subscriptionpromotionaloffers-_id_)Get details about a specific promotional offer for an auto-renewable subscription.[`Modify a Promotional Offer`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/patch-v1-subscriptionpromotionaloffers-_id_)Update the prices for a specific promotional offer for an auto-renewable subscription.[`Delete a Promotional Offer from a Subscription`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/delete-v1-subscriptionpromotionaloffers-_id_)Delete a specific promotional offer from an auto-renewable subscription.
